collections.title: Queer Horror
collections.description: Shudder celebrates the Queer films and Queer creators with new visions and lasting impact on horror.

collections.title: Shudder Essentials
collections.description: There are some movies you've got to see. These are Shudder Essentials.

collections.title: Film Noire
collections.description: Shudder presents a selection of Black Horror high.

collections.title: Foundations of Horror
collections.description: Celebrate the superb, scary cinema that gave birth to film's most popular genre.

collections.title: Slashics
collections.description: These Cananical chop-em-up's should be your first stop for classics of slasher cinema.

collections.title: Giallo!
collections.description: Black gloves and sharp knives abound in this essential excerpt of the Italian subgenre.
